name: Waffle Tower Defense (vgdc)
description:
Ants are attacking your waffle! Use your butter cannons and chocolate catapults to stop them from reaching your strawberries!

Waffle Tower Defense is a real-time strategy game that takes place on a waffle. Place tasty towers on your waffle to fight off the ants. Be strategic in placing your towers, because ants will try to eat sweet towers!
